label: Dimension
comment: A measure of spatial extent, such as length, breadth or height.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the contractual language for this work item dimension.
The textual description of this work item dimension. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
The measure of the diameter component for this spatial dimension.
The code specifying the type of spatial dimension, such as thickness, area, or volume.
The measure of the height component of this spatial dimension.
The unique identifier for this work item dimension. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
The measure of the length component of this spatial dimension.
The measured value for this work item dimension. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
The measure of the width component of this spatial dimension.
The code specifying the type of this work item dimension. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".

objectProperties.comment: A work item component dimension for this work item dimension. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".

referencedBy.comment: A work item dimension of the actual quantity in this work item quantity analysis.
A work item component dimension for this work item dimension.
Spatial dimensions specified for this logistics means of transport.
